title: Missing LICENSE file or license headers or license information in README

content.raw:
Dear gzweb devs,

I just noticed that there is no repository wide license information. Most C++ files have the Apache 2.0 license header, however none of the Javascript files contain one.

Would it be possible to either add a LICENSE file, add license information to the README or add license headers for all files?

Best regards,
Andreas
content.html:
Dear gzweb devs,

I just noticed that there is no repository wide license information. Most C++ files have the Apache 2.0 license header, however none of the Javascript files contain one.

Would it be possible to either add a LICENSE file, add license information to the README or add license headers for all files?

Best regards, Andreas
